pull.title: [Consensus] Add constant for maximum stack size
pull.body: Currently only used once, but for an important constant like this it seems worthwhile.

events.message: Add constant for maximum stack size

comments.body: Maybe mention what the unit is.
"maximum number of values on script interpreter stack" maybe
